trans-unit.source: This structure defines the dimensions and color information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

seg-source.mrk: This structure defines the dimensions and color information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

target.mrk: This structure defines the dimensions and color information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

trans-unit.source: Contains information about dimensions of a bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about dimensions of a bitmap.

target.mrk: Contains information about dimensions of a bitmap.

trans-unit.source: An array of tagRGBQUAD structures. The elements of the array that make up the color table.

seg-source.mrk: The elements of the array that make up the color table.

target.mrk: The elements of the array that make up the color table.

trans-unit.source: This structure should not be used for declaration as the biRGBQuad field does not have the right dimension.

seg-source.mrk: This structure should not be used for declaration as the biRGBQuad field does not have the right dimension.

target.mrk: This structure should not be used for declaration as the biRGBQuad field does not have the right dimension.

trans-unit.source: It is provided just for documentation.

seg-source.mrk: It is provided just for documentation.

target.mrk: It is provided just for documentation.

trans-unit.source: Concatenation of a suitable sized array to $tagBITMAPINFOHEADER must be used.

seg-source.mrk: Concatenation of a suitable sized array to $tagBITMAPINFOHEADER must be used.

target.mrk: Concatenation of a suitable sized array to $tagBITMAPINFOHEADER must be used.

trans-unit.source: Take care of the right initialization of 'biSize' field.

seg-source.mrk: Take care of the right initialization of 'biSize' field.

target.mrk: Take care of the right initialization of 'biSize' field.
